markdownRemark.html:
The sensors is required for JXMiner system and cpu fan management only. You can skip this process if you donâ€™t have any casing fans attached to the motherboard and have the cpu fan speed managed from BIOS

JXOS will try to automatically detect the correct Linux PWM sensors module in the motherboard but in most cases, a manual detection and setup is required to get the right kernel module loaded.

In case you need a manual detection, at the machine Terminal you can invoke :

sudo sensors-detect

and follow the script instruction to copy the correct module name to rc.local where it will be loaded automatically at the next boot.
